name: Six Shot Hell
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE AND IS SUPER BROKEN!!!

I was tasked with putting a shmup together in unity, this was my first ever attempt at doing this, my timeframe was six hours, I spent about 8 overall including art. I have learned a lot from this project. One Day I may come back to this project.

How to play:

You have four guns to pick from. You must reload before you can shoot. There is no goal. it's just a prototype.

You will need a game controller to play:

  • Escape to quit
  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to Aim(super broken)
  • Left & Right Bumpers to reload
  • Left and Right Triggers to Fire
  • Face buttons to change weapons.
You can read more about this project and other projects that I will be working on as part of my games programing course here "Bens Game Blog"
